params.name: encoder_pretrained_model_name_or_path
params.description: Information necessary to initiate the encoder. Can be either:A string, the model id of a pretrained model hosted inside a model repo on huggingface.co.A path to a directory containing model weights saved usingsave_pretrained(), e.g., ./my_model_directory/.

params.name: decoder_pretrained_model_name_or_path
params.description: Information necessary to initiate the decoder. Can be either:A string, the model id of a pretrained model hosted inside a model repo on huggingface.co.A path to a directory containing model weights saved usingsave_pretrained(), e.g., ./my_model_directory/.

params.name: model_args
params.description: All remaning positional arguments will be passed to the underlying models __init__ method.

params.name: kwargs
params.description: Can be used to update the configuration object (after it being loaded) and initiate the model (e.g.,output_attentions=True).To update the encoder configuration, use the prefix encoder_ for each configuration parameter.To update the decoder configuration, use the prefix decoder_ for each configuration parameter.To update the parent model configuration, do not use a prefix for each configuration parameter.Behaves differently depending on whether a config is provided or automatically loaded.
